DataMapper::Validate::ValidationErrors
In: lib/restfulx/rx_datamapper.rb

By default DataMapper validation errors doesn‘t have to_xml method. This is actually very useful when dealing with remote stateful clients such as Flex/AIR.

Add Flex-friendly to_xml implementation

    # File lib/restfulx/rx_datamapper.rb, line 56
56:       def to_xml
57:         xml = DataMapper::Serialize::XMLSerializers::SERIALIZER
58:         doc ||= xml.new_document
59:         root = xml.root_node(doc, "errors")
60:         @errors.each_key do |attribute|
61:           @errors[attribute].each do |msg|
62:             next if msg.nil?
63:             if attribute == "base"
64:               xml.add_node(root, "error", nil, {"message" => msg})
65:             else
66:               xml.add_node(root, "error", nil, {"field" => attribute.to_s.camel_case.dcfirst, "message" => msg})
67:             end
68:           end
69:         end
70:         xml.output(doc)
71:       end
